category_path_snippet_format.label: Category Path Snippet Format
category_path_snippet_format.comment: The snippet settings used to generate the category path
category_path_snippet_format.ewhelp:
This must be 4 numbers separated by a comma: [min level],[starting num],[ending num],[min length]:

  1. Min Level - categories with a level less than this will not be displayed
  2. Starting Num - the number of categories to show before truncation
  3. Ending Num - the minimum number of categories to show after truncation
  4. Min Length - the minimum number of characters the unsnipped category path must be before it will be snipped according to the starting num and ending num

Example: The category path Electronics -> Cameras -> Accesories -> Batteries would be truncated to Elecontrics -> Cameras -> ... -> Batteries if the starting number was 2 and the ending number was 1.

category_filter_mode.label: Category Filter Mode
category_filter_mode.comment: None: no filtering; Lowest: categories with the lowest level are picked; Highest: categories with highest level are picked. Note: level refers to how deep the category is in the tree.

max_categories_per_product.label: Max Categories per Product
